title: Letter from the U.S. Conference of Mayors on the Surface Transportation Bill and the Federal Aviation Administration | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
August 31, 2011

 



Letter from the U.S. Conference of Mayors on the Surface Transportation Bill and the Federal Aviation Administration





	Please see attached for a letter signed by U.S. Conference of Mayors urging Congress to move forward to pass a clean extension of the Surface Transportation Bill and the Federal Aviation Administration Reauthorization.
